#Import  libraries
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType
import json
import os

# Define all Folder paths used in the notebook


odw_json_folder_path = f"abfss://odw-config@{storage_account}odw-config/logging_table_definitions"
delta_table_path = f"abfss://logging@{storage_account}"

schema_json_path = f"abfss://odw-config@{storage_account}logging_table_definitions/tables_logs.json"

print(odw_json_folder_path)
print(delta_table_path)



print(schema_json_path)

# Create delta table steps
database_name = "logging"
table_name = "tables_logs"

# Read JSON schema file
schema_df = spark.read.option("multiline", "true").json(schema_json_path)
schema_json = schema_df.toJSON().first()

# Parse JSON schema into StructType
parsed_json = json.loads(schema_json)
fields_array = parsed_json["fields"]

for field in fields_array:
    field.setdefault("metadata", {})

schema_struct = StructType.fromJson({
    "type": "struct",
    "fields": fields_array
})

# Create Database if not exists
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS {database_name}")

# Create Delta Table if not exists
if not spark._jsparkSession.catalog().tableExists(database_name, table_name):

    column_definitions = ', '.join([f"{field.name} {field.dataType.simpleString()}" for field in schema_struct])

    # Create Delta Table
    spark.sql(f"""
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {database_name}.{table_name}
        ({column_definitions})
        USING DELTA
        LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
    """)

    print(f"Delta table {database_name}.{table_name} created successfully.")
else:
    print(f"Delta table {database_name}.{table_name} already exists.")
